name: Coco Cards Casino
description:
Made in 3 days for the GMC Jam 38 where the theme was "Three Simple Rules".

Game Design, Programming, GFX - GameDevDan
Music - NAL

Make your way to the Coco Cards Casino! Beat an assortment of weird characters by predicting the outcome of card flips and beating adjacent cards in a game of rock-paper-scissors. It's easier than it sounds, but can you become the champ?
